welcome.title: Welcome to OVGU
welcome.intro: You've just enrolled at Magdeburg University? With this app, you get an overview of all important information about life at OVGU.

steps:
This is the start screen.
Here you can find the latest news.
On the 2nd page there is the calendar so that you don't miss any event!
On the 3rd page is a list of all features.

You often use a feature?
You can tap on the heart to add it to the start screen.

These features appear here on the top.

Campus Map, Mensa und Links are selected by default. You can change it anytime!

features.title: Features
features.info:
You often use a feature?
You can tap on the heart to add it to the start screen.

about.title: About the app
about.main: The Welcome to OVGU app is an initiative of the Otto-von-Guericke University Magdeburg. The goal is to make everyday student life easier - especially for international students.

technicalImplementation.title: Technical Implementation
people:
Tien Do Nam
August 2020 - today
(former) Student at FIN
tiendonam.de

about.contribute:
This app is open source.
You can checkout the code here.
Feel free to create an issue or a pull request.

myEvents.title: My Events
myEvents.info: You can select events which are important to you. These events appear here and under "Next Events" on the start screen.

ovguAccount.title: OVGU Account
ovguAccount.info: You can access your mails as soon as you setup the OVGU account. Grades and timetable may be added soon.
ovguAccount.name: Name
ovguAccount.privacy: Your login credentials will be only stored encrypted on your device.

sync.title: Synchronization
sync.info: This app regularly downloads data from the server to keep you up to date. You can use the app offline using the locally stored data.

datePopup.normal: Following events are on this day:
datePopup.empty: There are no events on this day.

eventAddedPopup.title: Event added
eventAddedPopup.content: "$event" has been added to your personal list.

eventPastPopup.title: Event is already over
eventPastPopup.info: You can only add events which are in the future.

needUpdatePopup.title: Update needed
needUpdatePopup.info: Offline stored data will be used as long as you don't update the app to the latest version.

resetPopup.title: Reset Data
resetPopup.content: The app will be reset to the factory settings. Continue?
